name: Namco Universal Animation Binary
summary: Learn about .NUANMB files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate modders are most likely to encounter NUANMB files. Using various tools, these modders can modify Ultimate's in-game characters. While doing so, they may wish to modify a character's animations, which are stored in NUANMB files.

instructions: You can open NUANMB files in Blender with the io_scene_numdlb add-on installed. For complete instructions on how to do so, refer to io_scene_numdlb's GitLab page.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
